exceptions.tactic: apply (mkctrl A X Y TX TY B).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X : Set Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y B : relation X HB : evolve TX TX B (star B) HB' : well_founded (trans (comp (plus B) (plus (TX (T A))))) The term "A" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "forall R : relation2 ?X ?Y, evolve_t ?TX ?TY R (comp (star ?B) R) -> simulation_t ?TX ?TY (comp (star ?B) R)".

original: apply (mkctrl A X Y TX TY B). - intros R H. apply (mkmon A X Y TX TY (F R)). + apply monotonic_correct. auto. + intros S T H'. apply (mon_a A X Y TX TY (F R)). * eauto. * auto. - intros R S H'. apply (mon_a A X Y TX TY (F R)). + eauto. + auto.
